name: ALL THE IPSUMS!!!
author: John Hartley

sections.description:
Tired of searching for lorem ipsum text every time you want to toss in some dummy text while developing a site or showing concepts to a client? ALL THE IPSUMS generates lorem ipsum with 7 easy shortcodes (with room to grow!).

Pick from the following 7 shortcodes to get started with your placeholder text.

Shortcodes:

  • [zombie]
  • [bacon]
  • [skater]
  • [pommie]
  • [batman]
  • [metaphor]
  • [kitty]

More ipsums to come! If you’ve got an ipsum that you must have, let me know and I’ll add it in.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all-the-ispums directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use one of the above shortcodes in a post, page or widget
  4. Sit back and marvel at how much more fun your content is
sections.faq:
Why Not Lorem Ipsum

I’m trying to get away from the old stodgy Latin and integrate a hip new vibe in the Ipsum game.

short_description: The ultimate lorem ipsum text generator for WordPress. No need for browsing dummy content, just use ALL THE ISPUMS!!!
